PSG, to repeat the last two visits
Les Parisiens will look to continue their good run by visiting Bar√ßa, having won 4-1 in both their last two away matches, in the Champions League round of 16 and quarterfinals, respectively.
Barcelona, eight years without beating PSG at home
The Blaugranas should take advantage of the French team's number of absences and beat them again eight years after that legendary 6-1 victory in the 2016/17 Champions League Round of 16.
